proposedChanges.value: Use flat, line-based icons with uniform stroke width.
proposedChanges.rationale: Ensures a cohesive look across all icons.

proposedChanges.value: Use common metaphors like locks for security.
Adopt a calm, muted color palette.
proposedChanges.rationale: Aligns with the brand's calm and professional tone.

proposedChanges.value: Use glass or water motifs to represent transparency.
proposedChanges.rationale: Glass and water are clear and familiar transparency metaphors.

proposedChanges.value: Incorporate steering wheels to symbolize control.
proposedChanges.rationale: Steering wheels are intuitive for control.
risks: May not relate to all users

proposedChanges.value: Integrate geometric patterns for brand consistency.
proposedChanges.rationale: Geometric patterns are modern and professional.

proposedChanges.value: Feature a hero image with abstract landscapes.
proposedChanges.rationale: Abstract landscapes offer a calm, open feel.
